text: Afei Awurade ka kyerɛɛ me se, “Sɛ mpo, Mose ne Samuel15.1 Mose ne Samuel. Wogyee din efisɛ wogyinaa mu maa Israel nnebɔneyɛfo no wɔ Awurade anim. (2 Mose 32.11-14,30-34; 4 Mose 14.13-23; 5 Mose 9.18-20,25-29; 1 Sam 7.5-9; 12.19-25; Nnw 99.6-8). begyinaa mʼanim a anka me koma rentɔ nkɔ saa nnipa yi so. Ma womfi mʼani so! Ma wɔnkɔ!
